Utilize a rolled-up blanket: Roll up a blanket or towel and place it under your head as a makeshift pillow.
Use a soft surface: Place a soft surface, such as a folded towel or a small cushion, under your head to provide support.
Utilize the natural curve of your body: Rest your head on your bent knees or the curve of your shoulders to maintain a comfortable sleeping position.
Use a rolled-up sweater or shirt: Roll up a sweater or shirt and place it under your head for support.
Utilize a bag or pillowcase: If you have a bag or pillowcase that can be used as a makeshift pillow, place it under your head.
